text: Derrick Martin (born May 16, 1985) is an American former professional football strong safety. He played parts of 8 years in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Baltimore Ravens, Green Bay Packers, New York Giants, New England Patriots, and Chicago Bears. Martin was drafted out of the University of Wyoming by the Baltimore Ravens with the 208th pick in the sixth round of the 2006 NFL Draft. He won two Super Bowls; Super Bowl XLV with the Packers and Super Bowl XLVI with the Giants. ==Other websites== *Derrick Martin at nfl.com Category:1985 births Category:American football safeties Category:Sportspeople from Colorado Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Living people Category:New England Patriots players Category:New York Giants players
title: Derrick Martin
